# Pulmonary Trunk

- Pulmonary Trunk
    - Function
        - carries *deoxygenated blood* 
        - from: Right ventricle
        - bifurcates into *right pulmonary artery* and *left pulmonary artery*
    - Dimensions
        - length: 5cm
        - diameter: 3cm @standringGraysAnatomyAnatomical2021
